rules.name: myRule_18
rules.label: CTS OM R/T - From In Progress (+TT)

rules.name: myRule_24
rules.label: CTS OM R/T - From On Hold (+TT)

Flow.description: CTS OM - Update Case Metric fields on Status Changes

value.stringValue: AND( OR( [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Closed', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Problem', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Incident', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Transfers', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_Non_Warranty_Claims' ), PRIORVALUE([Case].Status ) = 'In Progress', NOT ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, 'In Progress') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_18
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Closed', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Problem', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Incident', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Transfers', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_Non_Warranty_Claims' ), PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status} ) = 'In Progress', NOT ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, 'In Progress') )

value.stringValue: AND( OR( [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Closed', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Problem', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Incident', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_OM_Transfers', [Case].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CTS_Non_Warranty_Claims' ), PRIORVALUE([Case].Status ) = 'On Hold', NOT ISPICKVAL([Case].Status, 'On Hold') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_24
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Closed', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Problem', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Account_Management_Incident', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_OM_Transfers', {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'CTS_Non_Warranty_Claims' ), PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status} ) = 'On Hold', NOT ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status}, 'On Hold') )

Flow.label: CTS OM Update Case Status Metrics

value.stringValue: CTS OM Metric - Time In Progress
CTS OM Metric - Time On Hold
